channel.title: [Question]
channel.description:
For a whitescape based client...when you go into NPC.cfg, how do you mess around with the NPCs level and hitpoints. I do Ctrl+f and search for the monster I want.Then the name gets highlighted. I then cannot change the HP and LVL.
If you know what I am doing tell me please! This would help imsensly (so my server does not crash every time a monster is attacked). Or, if you cannot catch my error, just post what you do VERY CLEARLY. VERY, VERY, VERY CLEARLY. Some people have said it is my computer, but...being the stupid idiot I am, I think I must have made a mistake. If it is a problem with my computer, notify me of it and/or any ways to fix the problem.
Thanks,
AkRiAm "Owner of BattleScape"

item.title: [Question]
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

ok…how? rofl :)[br][size=1]Posted at: March 29, 2006, 12:06:43 pm[/size][hr]syallab im going to get my hair cut but ill be back in .5hrs (30min) cya then

Read full topic

item.title: [Question]
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

check and see if the attributes of the file are on read only if so uncheck it if that dosnt help its you excel install and needs too be reinstalled most likley

Read full topic

item.title: [Question]
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

stop yelling I was just trying to impress you…and btw the other suggestion didnt work

[br][size=1]Posted at: March 28, 2006, 05:59:48 pm[/size][hr]It just makes the noise Windows makes when your cannot type there. Do I need to switch it to “View As DOS text” or what?[br][size=1]Posted at: March 28, 2006, 06:01:25 pm[/size][hr]anymore ideas?[br][size=1]Posted at: March 28, 2006, 06:16:11 pm[/size][hr]please anymore?

Read full topic
